actions.committee: Committee on Resources, and in addition to the Committee on Government Reform, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

official_title: To restore to the original owners certain lands that the Federal Government took for military purposes in 1940.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: 1940 Takings Restoration Act - Directs the heads of executive agencies to restore to the original owners certain lands taken for military purposes in 1940.

titles.title: To restore to the original owners certain lands that the Federal Government took for military purposes in 1940.
